pullRequest.title: Fix sonar cloud 2020 03 06
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR fixes some issues (more than 500) on SonarCloud.
The most notable change here is the removal of the Type Parameter in KapuaQuery
Related Issue
No related issues

nodes.bodyText:
did you change the loadConnectionUserCouplingModeFromConfig?
isn't it no more bound to a scope?
I dont' recall why we commented this code but, looking at it, I would leave it here for a while, waiting for a proper analysis about its role

nodes.bodyText: For all of this class I would use scopeId and id for as argument names so we can fall back on values coming from the EntityAttributes
It is possibile to change this to use Pattern?

Get this from ConsoleMessages.error().
Also for other occurrencies on this class
